title.narrative: Rural Development: Rural Small and Microenterprise Promotion Project - Phase II

description.narrative: The project objectives are to: (i) promote the development of viable SMEs and their professional organizations so that they can respond to the needs of the target group; (ii) improve the performance and productivity of SMEs through access to sustainable non-financial services; (iii) promote the use of appropriate technology, the observance of acceptable quality standards and better access to markets; (iv) enhance access to financial services adapted to the requirements of SMEs; and (v) improve the institutional and legal framework of SMEs.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Rural Small and Microenterprise Promotion Project - Phase II

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.

title.narrative: IATI documentation on IFAD corporate website

description.narrative: More information on how IFAD publish IATI data to ensure the effectiveness of development.
